tweet:
shipped SlidePainter and markdown support for app descriptions.

the markdown feature uses an llm to format text. had to patch it because it started hallucinating creative new names for user apps.

it is now strictly forbidden from renaming things.
alt_tweet:
new app: SlidePainter. does what it says on the tin.

also updated app descriptions to support markdown. the llm responsible for formatting tried to rebrand everyone's apps, so we lobotomized that creativity.

deploy pipeline fixed. production is production again.
